attributes.action: A declaration on side of the disabled offering 'the best possible support'.
attributes.additional_details: The disabled wait patiently and also anxiously for the DWP to write to them regarding applying for Personal Independence Payment, stating that Disability Living Allowance is to end.   The DWP’s decision is obviously to measure the degree of disability and whether that warrants financial support from the government – this is logical.  But people who are disabled feel, and quite rightly so, that the Government if not championing their rights but choosing to source out the assessment to a Target Driven Private Company Assessor and, because the individual’s disability is open to interpretation, on a very stressful occasion of the consultation with the DWP Contractor Assessor this can give rise to an incorrect assessment being recorded.
attributes.background: The Government appears not to support the disabled because they are not making sure DWP assessments are water-tight.
